resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: medium;">E perdonata !.. Alla mia tomba un giorno. <span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: medium;">Zopiro, oh pensier mio,<br style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: medium;" /><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman'; font-size: medium;">Verrai dolente a dar pietoso addio.
resource.chars:
E perdonata !.. Alla mia tomba un giorno. Zopiro, oh pensier mio,
Verrai dolente a dar pietoso addio.
